item.title: My Homelab
item.description: What do i use for hobbying So i own several systems that can be considered homelab, not all of which are modern. Network Netgear Gigabit Switch (managed Layer 2) Cisco 1921 Infrastructure Synology NAS (DS720+) HPE Proliant DL380e Gen8 2x Xeon E5-2430L V2 2
item.content:
What do i use for hobbying

So i own several systems that can be considered homelab, not all of which are modern.

Network

  • Netgear Gigabit Switch (managed Layer 2)
  • Cisco 1921

Infrastructure

  • Synology NAS (DS720+)
  • HPE Proliant DL380e Gen8
    • 2x Xeon E5-2430L V2
    • 2
